file_path: ../../Concerts\Coldplay - Coldplay Ghost Stories Live 2014\Coldplay_ Ghost Stories Live 2014.mp4.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\Coldplay - Coldplay Ghost Stories Live 2014\Coldplay_ Ghost Stories Live 2014.mp4.txt
title: Ghost Stories Live 2014
description: Ghost Stories Live 2014 is the fourth live album by British rock band Coldplay. It was released on 24 November 2014 by Parlophone in the United Kingdom, featuring live recordings of their sixth studio album, Ghost Stories.A concert film made from their shows at Sony Pictures Studios in Culver City were included in the package as well.

file_path: ../../Concerts\David Gilmour Live in Gdansk (2002)\David Gilmour Live in Gdansk (Recorded Sep 16, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\David Gilmour Live in Gdansk (2002)\David Gilmour Live in Gdansk (Recorded Sep 16, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.txt
title: David Gilmour - Live in Gdask
description: Live In Gdask is David's first solo live album and captures the magic of his concert held in front of 50,000 in the Gdask shipyards, the final performance of his critically acclaimed 2006 tour. It also features the first-ever recording of selected Pink Floyd classics performed live.  1. Speak To Me  2. Breathe (In The Air)  3. Time  4. Breathe (In The Air) (reprise)  5. Castellorizon*  6. On An Island*  7. The Blue*  8. Red Sky At Night*  9. This Heaven*  10. Then I Close My Eyes*  11. Smile*  12. Take A Breath*  13. A Pocketful Of Stones*  14. Where We Start*  15. Shine On You Crazy Diamond  16. Astronomy Domine*  17. Fat Old Sun  18. High Hopes*  19. Echoes*  20. Wish You Were Here  21. A Great Day For Freedom*  22. Comfortably Numb*
image: David Gilmour Live in Gdansk (Recorded Sep 16, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.jpg

file_path: ../../Concerts\Depeche Mode Tour of the Universe, Live in Barcelona (2010) (Recorded Dec 13, 2012, PLDHD)\Depeche Mode Tour of the Universe, Live in Barcelona (Recorded Dec 13, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\Depeche Mode Tour of the Universe, Live in Barcelona (2010) (Recorded Dec 13, 2012, PLDHD)\Depeche Mode Tour of the Universe, Live in Barcelona (Recorded Dec 13, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.txt
title: Depeche Mode: Tour Of The Universe
description: Playing 102 shows in 40 countries, Depeche Mode's acclaimed Tour Of The Universe saw Dave Gahan, Martin Gore and Andrew 'Fletch' Fletcher performing to over 2.7 million people. 'Tour Of The Universe - Live In Barcelona' contains 21 tracks recorded over two sold out nights at the Palau St Jordi in Barcelona on November 20th and 21st 2009, both shows being highlights of the celebrated tour.Released on Mute, this spectacular DVD release comes with a host of bonus content including four bonus tracks recorded across the two nights, a tour documentary - Inside The Universe - two tracks filmed at tour rehearsals in New York and Anton Corbijn's specially created 'screen films' for seven tracks plus further bonus montages created from the on-stage screens.
image: Depeche Mode Tour of the Universe, Live in Barcelona (Recorded Dec 13, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.jpg

file_path: ../../Concerts\Dido Live at Brixton Academy 2004 DVDRip\Dido Live at Brixton Academy 2004 DVDRip.mkv.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\Dido Live at Brixton Academy 2004 DVDRip\Dido Live at Brixton Academy 2004 DVDRip.mkv.txt
title: Dido - Live At Brixton Academy
description: Recorded at London's Brixton Academy in 2004, Dido Live draws on material from 1999 debut No Angel and 2003 follow-up Life for Rent. As she notes early in the show, "It's very nice to be in a place where I've seen hundreds and thousands of gigs." Dido and five-piece band--including two percussionists--proceed to execute a tight 14-song set, touching on favorites like "Thank You".
image: Dido Live at Brixton Academy 2004 DVDRip.mkv.jpg

file_path: ../../Concerts\Foje. Paskutinis koncertas [TVrip 1997 DVDmenu]\Foje. Paskutinis koncertas [TVrip 1997 DVDmenu].mkv.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\Foje. Paskutinis koncertas [TVrip 1997 DVDmenu]\Foje. Paskutinis koncertas [TVrip 1997 DVDmenu].mkv.txt
title: Foje atsisveikinimo koncertas
description: vienas iš trijų paskutinių grupės „Foje“ koncertų, vykusių 1997 m. gegužės mėnesį Klaipėdoje, Kaune ir Vilniuje. Į paskutinį iš atsisveikinimo koncertų, vykusį gegužės 17 d. Vilniaus Vingio parke, susirinko 60 tūkst. žiūrovų. 2016 m. duomenimis, šis koncertas buvo daugiausiai žiūrovų surinkęs koncertas Lietuvoje. Už koncertą Lietuvos kultūros ministerija grupei įteikė 50000 Lt premiją. „Foje“ atsisveikinimo koncertas 1997 m. Bravo muzikiniuose apdovanojimuose buvo pripažintas geriausiu metų renginiu, koncertuose įrašytos dainos 1999 m. buvo išleistos albume „Vilnius Kaunas Klaipėda“.

file_path: ../../Concerts\MTV Live - ''The Cure'' (Recorded Sep 1, 2012, PLDHD)\MTV Live - ''The Cure'' (Recorded Sep 1, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\MTV Live - ''The Cure'' (Recorded Sep 1, 2012, PLDHD)\MTV Live - ''The Cure'' (Recorded Sep 1, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.txt
title: MTV Live - The Cure
description: The Cure are an English rock band formed in Crawley, West Sussex, England in 1976. The band has experienced several line-up changes, with frontman, vocalist, guitarist and principal songwriter Robert Smith being the only constant member. The Cure first began releasing music in the late 1970s with its debut album Three Imaginary Boys (1979); this, along with several early singles, placed the band as part of the post-punk and new wave movements that had sprung up in the wake of the punk rock revolution in the United Kingdom. During the early 1980s, the band's increasingly dark and tormented music helped form the gothic rock genre.[1][2][3]

file_path: ../../Concerts\MTV World Stage - ''Gorillaz'' (2010) (Recorded Sep 25, 2013, PLDHD)\MTV World Stage - ''Gorillaz'' (Recorded Sep 25, 2013, PLDHD).mpg.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\MTV World Stage - ''Gorillaz'' (2010) (Recorded Sep 25, 2013, PLDHD)\MTV World Stage - ''Gorillaz'' (Recorded Sep 25, 2013, PLDHD).mpg.txt
title: MTV World Stage: Gorillaz
description: British alternative hip-hop project Gorillaz perform at the Camden Roundhouse in London, England, including fan favorite tracks such as "Feel Good, Inc" and "Stylo," as well as featuring special guests De La Soul, Bobby Womack and Mos Def in 2010.

file_path: ../../Concerts\Nirvana Live at the Paramount (1991)\Nirvana Live at the Paramount (Recorded Dec 13, 2013, PLDHD).mpg.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\Nirvana Live at the Paramount (1991)\Nirvana Live at the Paramount (Recorded Dec 13, 2013, PLDHD).mpg.txt
title: Nirvana: Live at the Paramount
description: Recorded in Seatle, WA on Halloween Night, 1991, Live at the Paramount is the only known Nirvana live show recorded on 16mm film. Now released to conside with the 20th anniversary of the release of Nirvana's watershed album, 'Nevermind', famed documentarian and music video director Lance Bangs has been personally involved in the restoration of the film and the result is, according to Nirvana bassist Krist Novoselic, "a pretty good representation of [the] band" in their heyday. Released September 27, 2011, the DVD and Blu-Ray contains the complete concert along with newly remastered stereo and 5.1 surround soundtracks. Setlist : Jesus Doesn't Want Me For A Sunbeam * Aneurysm * Drain You * School * Floyd the Barber * Smells Like Teen Spirit * About A Girl * Polly * Breed * Silver * Love Buzz * Lithium * Been A Son * Negative Creep * On A Plain * Blew * Rape Me * Territorial Pissings * Endless, Nameless
image: Nirvana Live at the Paramount (Recorded Dec 13, 2013, PLDHD).mpg.jpg

description: A troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

file_path: ../../Concerts\Radiohead (2008) In Rainbows From the Basement\RADIOHEAD In Rainbows – From the Basement.mkv.txt
full_path: D:\videos\Concerts\Radiohead (2008) In Rainbows From the Basement\RADIOHEAD In Rainbows – From the Basement.mkv.txt
title: From the Basement
description: An eclectic musical lineup, including Radiohead, Beck, Sonic Youth, White Stripes, Damien Rice, PJ Harvey and others, offers intense, no-frills performances that put the music front and center in this best-of collection from the IFC series. Songs include "Reckoner," "Motorcade," "Pink Stream," "Blue Orchid," "Delicate" and "The Devil," as well as "High Low" from José González, the Shins' "Turn on Me," "Videotape" by Thom Yorke and more.
image: RADIOHEAD In Rainbows – From the Basement.mkv.jpg

title: Radiohead: The King of Limbs  From the Basement
description: A live performance by Radiohead of their 2011 album The King of Limbs. This is their second full-episode performance, filmed at Maida Vale Studios in London, as part of the From the Basement television series produced by Nigel Godrich, Dilly Gent, James Chads and John Woollcombe.
image: Radiohead The King of Limbs (Recorded Sep 30, 2012, PLDHD).mpg.jpg

title: The Doors Live at the Bowl '68
description: Live at the Hollywood Bowl is the third official live album by the American rock band the Doors, released in May 1987 by Elektra Records. The concert was recorded on July 5, 1968, at the Hollywood Bowl in Los Angeles, the Doors' hometown.
image: The Doors Live at the Bowl '68 (Recorded Sep 27, 2013, PLDHD).mpg.jpg
